1、Go to refresh position page to see if order is executed 
2、Check network and re-login platform. If problem still exists, please contact online customer service；
trade.maxRangeTip: The maximum different between Execution price and current price, mean execution price should be within the range to execute
trade.marginInsufficient: Margin level is too low, please deposit
trade.marginLess: Margin level too low, there is liquidation risk to open position
trade.buyNumMin: Open position lot is less than minimum lot:
trade.buyNumMax: Open position lot exceed maximum lot:

trade.pendingPriceWarn: Order price is too close, please re-enter
trade.pendingPriceWarn2: Order price is too far, please re-enter
trade.nonStocksAndnonBullPointDesc: Pip value. when you hold 1 lot contact, the P/L change per 1 pip price change。E.g：Buy 1 lot EURUSD，from 1.12930 to1.12940（1 pip）, obtain USD 10 profit
trade.stocksPointDesc: Pip value,when you hold 1 lot contact, the P/L change per 1 pip price change E.g：Buy 1 lot stock, from 69 to 70（rise 10pip），obtain USD 1 profit
trade.bullBearPointDesc: Pip value,when you hold 1 lot contact, the P/L change per 1 pip price change. E.g：Buy 1 lot EURUSD Bull/Bear option, open at 79, rise to 80（1pip）, obtain USD 1 profit
trade.priceIntroContent: After order price setting, when market price trigger the order price, order will be executed at market price.
trade.collecPriceError: Collect price is too close to market price, please select available call level
trade.estMarginContent:
Bull bear option_margin occupied = Open position price x 1 lot pip value x lot。When you open position, options' position 'margin occupied' and 'maximim loss' are confirmed。

1）当When market price is not reach Call level：
- P/L =（Close position price-Open position price）x 1 lot pip value x lots，, means call level is not reached, refund premium；

2）When market price reach call level：
- P/L = Margin occupied（now close price = 0）, reach call level, position is force liquidated, all premium is deducted。

Remind：When reachs call level, will use real time exchange rate to calculate P/L., the above is for reference only
trade.estMarginDesc: Esimate occupy, mean the occupied margin when holding the contract（Weekend and holiday margin is calculated by holiday margin setting）；If holds 2 different direction position, the largest position margin will be calculated
trade.volumeExplain1: Pip value,when you hold 1 lot contact, the P/L change per 1 pip price change. E.g：Buy 1 lot EURUSD Bull/Bear option, open at 79, rise to 80（1pip）, obtain USD 1 profit. Contract value = 1 lot pip value x lots
trade.volumeExplain2: Pip value,when you hold 1 lot contact, the P/L change per 1 pip price change. E.g Buy 1 lot stock, from 69 to 70（rise 10pip），obtain USD 1 profit. Contract value = 1 lot pip value x lots
trade.volumeExplain3: Pip value,when you hold 1 lot contact, the P/L change per 1 pip price change. E.g：Buy 1 lot EURUSD，from 1.12930 to1.12940（1 pip）, obtain USD 10 profitContract value = 1 lot pip value x lots
trade.closeSuccessToast: Order success, please see close position record
trade.availableLoanContent1: Available loan amount from agent, maximum amount{0}
trade.availableLoanContent2: Agent's available loan amount=Maximum amount can borrow-outstanding loan
trade.availableLoanContent3: Your account is insufficient fund and has available loan amount, system will auto-borrow when you trade。Interest calculates from order placed, platform count interest on hourly basis, if less than 1 hour, will count 1 hour also. Loan interest==Loan principle *（Daily rate/24）* Loan hours，daily rate{0}。
trade.availableLoanContent4: Client maximum loan amount, maximum loan amount is{0}
trade.availableLoanContent5: Available loan amount=Maximum loan amount can borrow-outstanding loan amount
trade.availableLoanContent6: If your account has coming currency loan amount not repayment yet, after order executed system will auto repay
trade.availableLoanContent8: Available loan amount=Minimum（[Cross margin account net asset*(Maximum leverate ratio-1)- outstanding loan],currency maximum amount to borrow)
trade.unRangeMultilpe: Leverage ratio is not within the range
trade.multilpSettingTip1: Over leverage will increase the risk of liquidation，please remind the risk level
trade.etfTip: ETF is the abbreviation of Exchange Traded Funds, which is a special open-end fund. Investors can buy and sell fund shares in the spot market just like cryptocurrencies. At the same time, investors can also subscribe or redeem fund shares from fund management companies.
trade.purchaseOrRedemptionTip: Purchase / Redeem: means that investors can purchase or redeem fund share tokens from the fund management company, click to go to.
trade.noFeature: This feature is not currently supported
trade.openMarginExplain: Opening margin refers to the minimum cash amount expected to be paid when opening a position, and the calculation result is subject to the final calculation at the time of transaction.
trade.feeExplain: The handling fee refers to the fee that the customer needs to pay to the broker when the transaction is carried out, and the calculation at the time of the actual transaction shall prevail.
trade.validityPeriodExplain: It refers to the effective time period for the customer to place a limit order. If the order fails to be executed until the end of the specified validity period, the transaction will be cancelled.
trade.profitLossExplain: Take Profit Stop Loss refers to the minimum and maximum limits of profits and losses set by customers in transactions. When the profit reaches the take profit level, or the loss reaches the stop loss level, the transaction will be automatically canceled.
trade.stopLossTipsBuy: When the price of the product reaches or falls below the stop-loss price, the position will be automatically closed.
trade.stopProfitTipsBuy: When the price of the product reaches or falls below the stop-loss price, the position will be automatically closed.
trade.stopProfitTipsSell: When the price of the product reaches or exceeds the stop-loss price, the position will be automatically closed.
trade.entrustDes: Please pay attention to the transaction notice
trade.balanceLowGoRecharge: Your trading account balance is insufficient, please recharge your wallet first, and then transfer assets to your trading account to continue trading.
trade.balanceLow: Your balance is insufficient, you can top up your wallet and then try the transaction again.
trade.trustPriceTips: The order price refers to the preset buying and selling price when the investor chooses the limit order transaction. When the market price reaches the preset price, the exchange will automatically execute the transaction.
trade.positionLastPriceTips1: The latest price refers to the latest buying and selling price in the market, which can be used as a reference for investors to close positions.
trade.positionLastPriceTips2: When it is Buy position the latest price is market Buy price.
trade.positionLastPriceTips3: When it is Sell position the latest price is market Sell price.
trade.tradeFloatLayerPopover: You can open one-click trading here so that you can quickly place an order.
trade.closePositionTip2: The maximum lots for closing this position is {0}, please enter again
trade.orderTriggeredTips: SL and TP are guaranteed unless there was a gap through the order. To remove, set the value to 0.
trade.stopSucc: Take Profit and Stop Loss are set successfully
trade.stopProfitSucc: The take profit setting is successful
trade.stopLossSucc: The stop loss setting is successful
trade.transferBtnTip: Transfer wallet assets to trading account
trade.expireType2Tips: The current week refers to the 7 days from the day you submit the limit order, and the limit order is valid within 7 days.
trade.expireType1Tips: The current day refers to the time calculated 24 hours from the day you submit the limit order, and the limit order is valid within 24 hours.
trade.positionDesc: Position refers to the position held by the investor after the successful opening of the position. You can check the profit and loss and close the position here.
trade.curTrustDesc: The current orders refer to the buy and sell orders submitted by investors that are waiting to be executed, and the unfulfilled orders can be cancelled here.
trade.profitLossWarn: The stop loss price you entered must be {0}, please enter again
trade.profitLossWarnTip: Stop loss price is too far, please re-enter
trade.takeProfitWarn: The take profit price you entered must be {0}, please enter again
trade.takeProfitWarnTip: Take profit price is too far, please re-enter
trade.marketPriceExplain: Market orders are effectively executed at the best available prices in the market.
trade.limitPriceExplain: A limit order refers to an order placed by an investor specifying the entrusted quantity and the acceptable highest buying price or lowest selling price.
trade.spreadIntro1: The spread is the difference between the buying price and the selling price in foreign exchange trading. At the moment of opening a position, the system will charge the spread fee, which may vary depending on the product.
trade.spreadIntro2: In addition, the spread can be used to measure the liquidity of the foreign exchange market. When the liquidity of the market is high, the spread may decrease; when the market is less interested in the trading product, the spread may expand.
trade.closePboOrderFail: Failed to cancel the order, the order has been filled
trade.currentLastPriceTips1: The latest price refers to the latest buying and selling price in the market, which can be used as a reference for investors.
trade.currentLastPriceTips2: When it is Buy order the latest price is market Buy price.
trade.currentLastPriceTips3: When it is Sell order the latest price is market Sell price.
trade.stopLossTips: When the position direction is buying, the position will be automatically closed when the price of the product reaches or falls below the stop-loss price;
trade.stopLossTips2: When the position direction is selling, the position will be automatically closed when the price of the product reaches or falls below the take-profit price.
trade.stopProfitTips: When the position direction is buying, the position will be automatically closed when the price of the product reaches or exceeds the take-profit price;
trade.stopProfitTips2: When the position direction is selling, the position will be automatically closed when the price of the product reaches or falls below the take-profit price.

contract.interestTip: The interest paid or gained,for holding the position overnight.Positive means gain,negative  means paid.
contract.interestTip1: The estimated hourly borrow rate charged on your position

loanNotice.1:
Maximum amount to borrow from platform, system maximum amount to borrow{0}
 Available borrow amount=System maximum amount to borrow-loaned but not repayment asset
loanNotice.2:
Loan currency{0}，Daily rate{1}, from loan application to count, on hourly basis, if less than 1 hour, count as 1 hour。
 Loan interest==Loan principle*（Daily rate/24）*loan hours

assets.loanAmountExcess: Exceed maximum loan amount can be borrowed
assets.name: Name
assets.transferTip3: Account to transfer in does not have that account currency
assets.transferTip4: Transfer amount cannot exceed maximum available transfer amount
assets.transferTip5: Transfer amount cannot less than minimum available transfer amount
assets.walletTips: The wallet is a safe asset storage tool for deposit and withdrawal, but it cannot be used directly for transactions. Please make a deposit for the wallet first, and then transfer the assets from the wallet to the trading account for transaction.
assets.tradingAccount: A trading account refers to an account used by investors to buy/sell products. Please transfer assets from the wallet to the trading account before trading in order to proceed with the transaction.
assets.forWalletChargeTips: When the balance that can be transferred in the wallet is insufficient, you can click here to deposit funds into the wallet first.
assets.rateDesc: The exchange rate of currency often changes based on market conditions, and ultimately the exchange rate at the time of actual order placement will prevail.
assets.transferSuccessTrade: The transfer is successful, let's trade now!

modules.defaultContent: Here is the default copy of the module

ransom.tip2: Refers to the amount to be deducted from the [Fund Product Net Value Account], not the amount paid to Client C

standard.tip3: The order execution standard has not been set yet, please add！
standard.tip5: The sum of all percentages cannot be greater than 100%

fundInfo.fundChartTip: The data is for reference only, past performance does not represent future performance!
fundInfo.redeemSubmiteedDesc: It is expected that the share will be confirmed before T+2, please pay attention to the share confirmation message
fundInfo.applyRule_tip1: Purchase in share, mean when purchase fund, fill the purchase share only
fundInfo.applyRule_tip2: Purchase price is on the base of real time net asset value to execute
fundInfo.applyRule_tip3: After purchase flow finished, the fund token will deposit to your Spot wallet, purchase fee will direct debit from your Spot wallet
fundInfo.applyRule_tip4: USDT will be deducted as transaction fee when purchase using USDT to purchase; the transaction fee will be deducted from each asset according to the proportion of the fund when purchasing with a basket of assets.
fundInfo.jz_formulaContent: Net asset value=Total asset value/Fund latest shares
fundInfo.redeem_tip1: Redeem in share, mean when redeem fund, fill the Redeem share only
fundInfo.redeem_tip2: Redeem price base on unknown price principle, estimate to be executed according to the net asset value price after share confirmation on T+2
fundInfo.redeem_tip3: After the Redeem process finished, the fund tokens you redeemed will be deposited to your Spot wallet with the selected receiving assets
fundInfo.fundRedeemFormula4: Use USDT to subscribe and pay for purchase fee.
fundInfo.fundRedeemFormula5: Purchase fee = fund net value purchase * (1 + fee rate)
fundInfo.fundRedeemFormula6: Use a basket of assets to purchase and pay for purchase fees:
fundInfo.fundRedeemFormula8: Asset {number}=Asset component {number} / Purchase fund unit *（1 + fee rate%）
fundInfo.fundRedeemFormula9: When redeeming in USDT, USDT handling fee will be deducted. When redeeming a basket of assets, the handling fee will be deducted from each asset according to the proportion of the fund.
fundInfo.fundRedeemFormula11: Received USDT=net value of redeemed fund units *(1-fee rate%)
fundInfo.fundRedeemFormula12: Calculation of a basket of assets redemption:
fundInfo.fundRedeemFormula14: Assets {number} = Investment component {number} / Redemption Units of Fund * (1 - fee rate%)
fundInfo.assetIndexQquestionTip: The picture shows the market performance of the assets contained in the index constituent stocks in the recent 24 hours(Quotation unit:USDT)
fundInfo.assetQquestionTip: The chart refers to the most recent 24H market performance of the assets included in the fund's portfolio(Quotation unit:USDT)
fundInfo.fundTokenTradeTip: When the fund token is listed, investors can buy and sell fund shares in the open spot market just like buying and selling cryptocurrencies. Click to go to
fundInfo.needAssets: Estimated amount you have to pay
fundInfo.applyCalculateTip: Tips：The above estimated calculation includes Purchase fee, and it subject to actual transaction.
fundInfo.t2Tip2: Tip：The estimated amount based on the calculation of NAV amount after share confirmation on T+2, after the total redemption amount is determined, the redemption amount of a each asset is calculated according to the weight of a basket of currencies.
fundInfo.payBasketBuy: Pay basket of assets to purchase fund
fundInfo.applyBasketExplain: Investor use a basket of asset to submit Purchase to Fund company, a basket of asset mean the asset component and proportion are exactly the same as the fund
fundInfo.applyCurrencyExplain: Investor use {currency} to submit fund purchase to fund company
fundInfo.redeemBasketExplain: Investor submit redemption to fund company with fund shares, a bakset of assets with exactly the same composition and proportion with the fund
fundInfo.redeemCurrencyExplain: Investor submit redemption to fund company with fund shares, fund company pay {currency} to investor
fundInfo.chooseGetAssets: Choose the way to obtain asset
fundInfo.buyTip: To obtain the asset via trade
fundInfo.notDepositTip: Deposit is not available with this asset
fundInfo.deductRuledesc: Management fee refers to the cost of managing the fund from fund manager. Management fee is settled from fund asset each date {time}, NAV reflects the fee deducted, no further fee deduct from each trade.
fundInfo.deductRuledesc2: Redeem fee refers to fee generated from redeem, which collect once only .

bannerTopic.title: How to Seize Investment Opportunities by Paying Attention to Eurozone CPI
bannerTopic.content: On June 15th, the European Central Bank raised all three key interest rates in the Eurozone by 25 basis points, making it the eighth rate hike since July of last year. Despite slow economic growth, high inflation expectations make it difficult for the ECB to pause the rate hike. More rate increases may occur in July to combat inflation. The new rates will be effective from June 21st. The ECB aims to bring down inflation to 2% in the medium term. In May, the Eurozone's overall inflation rate was 6.1%, and the core inflation rate was higher than expected. The ECB revised its inflation expectations for 2023, while the Federal Reserve announced a pause in rate hikes. Investors should watch the Eurozone CPI YoY data on June 30th to assess future rate changes.
bannerTopic.content2: Grab the excellent winning opportunity in Headline.net!
bannerTopic.card1Content: Headline.net allows traders to deposit and withdraw with fiat or crypto currencies. Your funds will be kept in segregates accounts and all transactions are traceable.
bannerTopic.card2Content: Headline.net offers various ways to keep traders informed of latest global events and market information so that they can grab great trading opportunities.
bannerTopic.card3Content: You can Register with a telegram account, trade with headline telegram bot, receive timely market information or ask for any instruments you want in telegram group.
